StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetBrcList]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CurrentFiscalYear int AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
Declare @PreviousFY int Set @PreviousFY = @CurrentFiscalYear - 4
SELECT * FROM USMC.Brc WHERE FiscalYear >= @PreviousFY and FiscalYear <= @CurrentFiscalYear Order By FiscalYear desc
END
